thread.title: McConnell’s jumper gives 76ers 97-95 win over Nets
thread.title_full: McConnell’s jumper gives 76ers 97-95 win over Nets

author: wtopstaff
title: McConnell’s jumper gives 76ers 97-95 win over Nets
text:
Home » News » Sports » NBA » McConnell's jumper gives 76ers… McConnell’s jumper gives 76ers 97-95 win over Nets By The Associated Press October 10, 2015 6:19 pm Philadelphia 76ers guard T.J. McConnell (12) drives past Brooklyn Nets guard Shane Larkin (0) during the first half of an NBA preseason basketball game, Saturday, Oct. 10, 2015, in Albany, N.Y. (AP Photo/Mike Groll) 
ALBANY, N.Y. (AP) — T.J. McConnell made a 10-foot jumper with 6.5 seconds left, lifting the Philadelphia 76ers a 97-95 preseason win over the Brooklyn Nets on Saturday. 
McConnell, a rookie guard, connected as the shot clock expired. He finished with seven points and six assists. 
Jarrett Jack scored 20 points for Brooklyn, including a tying 3-pointer with 29.3 seconds left. Topics:
